messages.body: $AAPL $FIT Apple Watch, FitBit could feel cost of U.S. tariffs https://www.reuters.com/article/us-usa-trade-apple/apple-watch-fitbit-could-feel-cost-of-u-s-tariffs-idUSKBN1KA0E2

links.title: Apple Watch, FitBit could feel cost of U.S. tariffs
links.description: (Reuters) - The latest round of U.S. tariffs on $200 billion of Chinese goods could hit the Apple Watch, health trackers, streaming music speakers and other accessories assembled in China, government rulings on tariffs show. The rulings name Apple Inc's watch, several Fitbit Inc activity trackers and connected speakers from Sonos Inc.
